name: CINEMATIC PARALLELS
description:
What's this? The hottest new dainty game of this autumn?! Join Hatcher and August in the adventure of... an evening. Battle foes, discover secrets, explore unique locations in:

CINEMATIC PARALLELS

FEATURES:
- 16-bit-inspired, 6-colour graphics!
- 3 fully-fledged levels!
- 20+ Guest NPCs!
- Mediocre original music!
- Funny jokes! (Unless your sense of humor is bad!)
- Terrible protagonists!
- PG-13 Violence!
- EZ Battles!
- Tons of completely original art assets!
- Wordcount somewhere between 1000 and 3500 words we swear!
